LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom Lookup box for user to enter name of record (or other configured field) and select multiple records from search results

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: Enter the name of the icon to be used on the queried/selected records.

property.name: objApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Enter the object API Name to query records for when search is performed.

property.name: fieldApiNames
property.label: Field API Names
property.description: Optionally enter fields here. These will bind to the search query in the lookup.

property.name: whereClause
property.label: Where Clause
property.description: Optionally enter where clause to filter records. Do not include 'WHERE' in this field.
